course_title: Special Topics in Music: Hip-Hop Composition
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 12 / Seats Avail: 1Waitlist Total: 0
class_notes:
Led by Atlanta hip hop DJ Dion Liverpool (aka DJ Rasta Root), students will work collaboratively over the semester as producers, instrumentalists, and rappers to create hip hop tracks. Students will also meet other members of the Atlanta hip hop community to learn about the broader cultural and commercial context of hip hop in Atlanta. The course will be taught using the music production software Serato Studio. No prerequisite necessary.
Music majors: fulfills a music-major general elective.
course_description: Seminar or lecture series of topics in music. May be repeated for credit when topic varies.
